text_en: Now it's possible to include news blasts that can be changed by updating a file on a website. Visit {a=https://patreon.com/renpytom/}Tom's Patreon{/a} to find out more.
text_zh: Now it's possible to include news blasts that can be changed by updating a file on a website. Visit {a=https://patreon.com/renpytom/}Tom's Patreon{/a} to find out more.
text_ru: Now it's possible to include news blasts that can be changed by updating a file on a website. Visit {a=https://patreon.com/renpytom/}Tom's Patreon{/a} to find out more.
text_ko: 이제 웹사이트에서 업데이트되는 파일로 소식을 포함하는 것이 가능합니다. {a=https://patreon.com/renpytom/}Tom's Patreon{/a}을 방문해 자세히 알아보세요.
text_es: Now it's possible to include news blasts that can be changed by updating a file on a website. Visit {a=https://patreon.com/renpytom/}Tom's Patreon{/a} to find out more.
